Interface TaskProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskProcessorAsync, TaskProcessorBase, TaskProcessorDelegating, TaskProcessorEventDriven
public interface TaskProcessor
A generic interface to control different kinds of task processors.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getName()
    Get name of processor.
    boolean
    isCompleted()
    Check if all submitted tasks have been completed.
    boolean
    isShutdown()
    Check if processor has been shut down.
    void
    shutdown()
    Shutdown the processor.
    void
    shutdownAndAbort()
    Shutdown and abort all submitted tasks.
    void
    submit(LangUtil.RunnableThrows<Exception> task)
    Submit a task that does nor return a value.
    <T> CompletableFuture<T>
    submit(Callable<? extends T> task)
    Submit a task that that returns a result.
    boolean
    waitForCompletion(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
    Wait until all submitted tasks have completed or a timeout occurs.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get name of processor.
      Returns:
      the task processor's name

    • shutdownAndAbort

      void shutdownAndAbort()
      Shutdown and abort all submitted tasks.

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the processor.

      Once a processor is shut down, it will not accept new tasks.

    • isShutdown

      boolean isShutdown()
      Check if processor has been shut down.
      Returns:
      true, if shutdown() has been called

    • isCompleted

      boolean isCompleted()
      Check if all submitted tasks have been completed.
      Returns:
      true, if all submitted tasks have been completed.

    • waitForCompletion

      boolean waitForCompletion(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Wait until all submitted tasks have completed or a timeout occurs.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the timeout value
      timeUnit - the unit to apply to the timeout value
      Returns:
      true, if all tasks have completed, otherwise false (timeout)

    • submit

      <T> CompletableFuture<T> submit(Callable<? extends T> task)
      Submit a task that that returns a result.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the task result type
      Parameters:
      task - the task to execute
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture for the task

    • submit

      void submit(LangUtil.RunnableThrows<Exception> task)
      Submit a task that does nor return a value.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to execute
